snippet.title: KIN:D Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description: I'm keeping my eye on KIN:D, a game I discovered during Busan Indie Connect Festival that looks nothing short of delightful. This new trailer further highlights the bond between the two main characters. Fingers crossed that it will be translated into other languages! Follow: https://twitter.com/TeamAA_twt
